Title: 097: Leveraging Data Science Techniques into E-Commerce & Other Fields
Description:
In this episode of the SuperDataScience Podcast, I chat with Digital eCommerce specialist, Nick Pape. You will hear about eCommerce, CMS/Customer Management System & Geodemographic Segmentation. You will also get some interesting insights into the purchasing habits of people, and you will also hear what's actually going on with eCommerce and what customers are going through in this process.


If you enjoyed this episode, check out show notes, resources, and more at www.superdatascience.com/97
